title: High Ping
body:
Usually since server transfer I played with 65~ ping from NorCal, but since two days ago I've been averaging 95 ping and I know it's not on my end since I've done multiple router resets, restarted my computer, ect. I don't have unusually high ping to anything else except the league servers.

This happened a couple months ago and I know it was a Riot problem because it was posted on the boards and was resolved, it only took like a couple hours for it to go back down but it's been like this for two days now so I'm not sure what's up.

http://puu.sh/qOg6A/01eab3424c.png is my speed test.

replies.body: Your network might be having trouble connecting to our servers specifically, and it could even be a result of a change in your ISP routing to us.  As a first step, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen up your PC.  Hopefully, this will fix this up but let me know if your issue persists.
Already did the Hextech Repair thing and it didn't fix anything, my DNS is already changed from before.

Thanks for the steps you've taken so far, and we'd like to keep helping!  Reach out to us in a ticket, and we'll look into your case.  Attach the logs you received through the hextech repair tool and attach it to your ticket, and we'll reply asap!
the ping spikes this patch are horrible we really do not know what to do

A lot of people are having the exact same issue. It only has been happening this patch.

I used to have 44 ping. Now I have anywhere between 60 - 120. 

Nothing has changed except the patch in the game.
waiting for another red post...it's still like this I will provide a tracert if needed.

I'm from Michigan, I have Charter. I average 28-31 ping in game, but the last 2 days I've had 80-90 ping but it feels like more. Speed tests all come back normal. It's only in game that I have been having latency issues. And I'm on a wired connection.
Same for me but I'm on CCI
By question do you have Charter at all since I've also been having issues and so have others.
